searchQuery.query:
source spans last 2h
|filter tags['http.status_code'] != null && tags['http.status_code']:number > 399
| choose $m.timestamp as Err_Time, $l.serviceName as Err_Service,$l.operationName as Failed_Action,traceID as Trace, tags['http.status_code'] as Status
| join ( source spans last 3h
        | choose $m.timestamp as Start_Time, traceID as Trace, $l.operationName as Action, $l.serviceName as Start_Service) using  Trace into Root
| create Time_to_fail from Err_Time:timestamp - Root.Start_Time:timestamp 
| filter Time_to_fail:num > 0
| join (source logs last 2h
        | filter trace_id != null
        | groupby trace_id as Trace aggregate count() as All_Logs, count_if($m.severity > INFO) as HighSev_Logs) using Trace into Logs
| filter Logs.HighSev_Logs > 0
|choose Trace, 
        Root.Start_Time:timestamp.formatTimestamp('auto')  as Started,
        Time_to_fail as Failed_After, 
        Status as Err_Code, Root.Start_Service as Starting_Service, 
        Root.Action as Starting_Action, 
        Err_Service, 
        Failed_Action, 
        Logs.All_Logs as All_Logs,
        Logs.HighSev_Logs as HighSev_Logs
